body: I think this is because of https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/commit/910227d94b0b381ab52a5e9ddb6c672d9bf7f9a1 . Instead of packaging all the test directory into jar.mn, we should just request Utils.jsm with a file:/// URL or copy the code into the xpc_head.js file.
body_text: I think this is because of 910227d . Instead of packaging all the test directory into jar.mn, we should just request Utils.jsm with a file:/// URL or copy the code into the xpc_head.js file.
